揪.definition: to seize; to clutch; to grab firmly and pull

揪出.definition: to uncover; to ferret out (the culprit)

揪心.definition: lit. grips the heart; worried; anxious

揪痧.definition: folk remedy involving repeatedly pinching the neck, throat, back etc to increase blood flow to the area and relieve inflammation

揪辮子.definition: to grab sb by the queue (i.e. hair); to seize on weak points; to exploit the opponent's shortcomings

揪送.definition: to seize and send (to court, to face punishment)

揪鬥.definition: to seize and subject to public criticism (form of persecution during the Cultural Revolution)
